overview_of_class: The legal and ethical framework defining media freedoms and constraints in the US, including copyright and trademark issues. Historical context and focus on the evolution of constitutional, statutory, judicial and ethical standards.
name: Media Law & Ethics
title: JOUR JOUR 370-0-20 Media Law & Ethics
enrl_requirement: Enrollment Requirements: Reserved for Medill Sophomores, Juniors & Seniors

descriptions.name: Overview of class
descriptions.value: The legal and ethical framework defining media freedoms and constraints in the US, including copyright and trademark issues. Historical context and focus on the evolution of constitutional, statutory, judicial and ethical standards.
